name: Baldy Drawn Super Mario
description:
- Controls

Cursor keys / WASD to move

- Level Editor Keys

0 (zero) to toggle level editor

1-5 to switch tiles, E to pick tile under the cursor

9 to place enemies

Q to Toggle auto tile arranging

R to Reset the level

L to Switch Levels (See levels 1-3)

"Badly Drawn" is simply a tag we've invented to describe this style of project.
